title: The Land of Green Plums
description: Set in Romania at the height of Ceausescu's brutal reign of terror, "TheLand of Green Plums" tells the story of a group of young students, each of whom has left the impoverished provinces in search of better prospects in the city. It is a profound illustration of a totalitarian state which comes to inhabit every aspect of life; to the extent that everyone, event the strongest, must either bend to the oppressors, or resist them and perish.Librarian note: This is an alternate edition for ISBN 9781862072602.
